name: Wipeout (itch) (TheMoonrise)
description:
Go coco-nuts on your board

In Wipeout your goal is to score as many style points as possible before the wave inevitably catches up to you. Performing awesome stunts scores you points and allows you to keep your speed to delay your wipeout.

How to play?

Make sure to keep your balance using the left and right arrow keys. With perfect balance you build up your score multiplier. Ride to the upper edge of the wave to jump using the up and down arrow keys. While in the air press the shown keys in the correct order to perform stunts.
